info.title: Binance Public Spot API
info.description:
OpenAPI Specifications for the Binance Public Spot API

API documents:
  - [https://github.com/binance/binance-spot-api-docs](https://github.com/binance/binance-spot-api-docs)
  - [https://binance-docs.github.io/apidocs/spot/en](https://binance-docs.github.io/apidocs/spot/en)

get.description:
Test connectivity to the Rest API.

Weight(IP): 1

Test connectivity to the Rest API and get the current server time.

Weight(IP): 1

Current exchange trading rules and symbol information

- If any symbol provided in either symbol or symbols do not exist, the endpoint will throw an error.
- All parameters are optional.
- permissions can support single or multiple values (e.g. SPOT, ["MARGIN","LEVERAGED"])
- If permissions parameter not provided, the default values will be ["SPOT","MARGIN","LEVERAGED"].
  - To display all permissions you need to specify them explicitly. (e.g. SPOT, MARGIN,...)

Examples of Symbol Permissions Interpretation from the Response:
- [["A","B"]] means you may place an order if your account has either permission "A" or permission "B".
- [["A"],["B"]] means you can place an order if your account has permission "A" and permission "B".
- [["A"],["B","C"]] means you can place an order if your account has permission "A" and permission "B" or permission "C". (Inclusive or is applied here, not exclusive or, so your account may have both permission "B" and permission "C".)

Weight(IP): 10

200.description: Current exchange trading rules and symbol information

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: If limit > 5000, then the response will truncate to 5000

get.description:
Get compressed, aggregate trades. Trades that fill at the time, from the same order, with the same price will have the quantity aggregated.
- If `fromId`, `startTime`, and `endTime` are not sent, the most recent aggregate trades will be returned.
- Note that if a trade has the following values, this was a duplicate aggregate trade and marked as invalid:

  p = '0' // price

  q = '0' // qty

  f = -1 // Ô¨Årst_trade_id

  l = -1 // last_trade_id

Weight(IP): 2

Kline/candlestick bars for a symbol.
Klines are uniquely identified by their open time.

- If `startTime` and `endTime` are not sent, the most recent klines are returned.

Weight(IP): 2

The request is similar to klines having the same parameters and response.

uiKlines return modified kline data, optimized for presentation of candlestick charts.

Weight(IP): 2

Current average price for a symbol.

Weight(IP): 2

Price change statistics for a trading day.

Notes:
- Supported values for timeZone:
  - Hours and minutes (e.g. -1:00, 05:45)
  - Only hours (e.g. 0, 8, 4)

Weight:
- `4` for each requested symbol.
- The weight for this request will cap at `200` once the number of symbols in the request is more than `50`.

The window used to compute statistics is typically slightly wider than requested windowSize.

openTime for /api/v3/ticker always starts on a minute, while the closeTime is the current time of the request. As such, the effective window might be up to 1 minute wider than requested.

E.g. If the closeTime is 1641287867099 (January 04, 2022 09:17:47:099 UTC) , and the windowSize is 1d. the openTime will be: 1641201420000 (January 3, 2022, 09:17:00 UTC)

Weight(IP): 4 for each requested symbol regardless of windowSize.

The weight for this request will cap at 200 once the number of symbols in the request is more than 50.

parameters.name: windowSize
parameters.description:
Defaults to 1d if no parameter provided.
Supported windowSize values:
1m,2m....59m for minutes
1h, 2h....23h - for hours
1d...7d - for days.

Units cannot be combined (e.g. 1d2h is not allowed)

parameters.name: type
parameters.description:
Supported values: FULL or MINI.
If none provided, the default is FULL

spotBNBBurn.name: spotBNBBurn
spotBNBBurn.description: Determines whether to use BNB to pay for trading fees on SPOT

interestBNBBurn.name: interestBNBBurn
interestBNBBurn.description: Determines whether to use BNB to pay for margin loan interest

depositHistory.name: status
depositHistory.description:
* `0` - pending
* `6` - credited but cannot withdraw
* `1` - success

withdrawHistory.name: status
withdrawHistory.description:
* `0` - Email Sent
* `1` - Cancelled
* `2` - Awaiting Approval
* `3` - Rejected
* `4` - Processing
* `5` - Failure
* `6` - Completed

queryConvertTransfer.name: accountType
queryConvertTransfer.description: MAIN: main account. CARD: funding account. If it is blank, we will query spot and card wallet, otherwise, we just query the corresponding wallet

current.name: current
current.description: Current querying page. Start from 1. Default:1

positionSide.name: positionSide
positionSide.description: Default BOTH for One-way Mode ; LONG or SHORT for Hedge Mode. It must be sent in Hedge Mode.

fromId.name: fromId
fromId.description: Trade id to fetch from. Default gets most recent trades.

listClientOrderId.name: listClientOrderId
listClientOrderId.description: A unique Id for the entire orderList

newClientOrderId.name: newClientOrderId
newClientOrderId.description: Used to uniquely identify this cancel. Automatically generated by default

strategyType.name: strategyType
strategyType.description: The value cannot be less than 1000000.

newOrderRespType.name: newOrderRespType
newOrderRespType.description: Set the response JSON. MARKET and LIMIT order types default to FULL, all other orders default to ACK.

selfTradePreventionMode.name: selfTradePreventionMode
selfTradePreventionMode.description: The allowed enums is dependent on what is configured on the symbol. The possible supported values are EXPIRE_TAKER, EXPIRE_MAKER, EXPIRE_BOTH, NONE.

recvWindow.name: recvWindow
recvWindow.description: The value cannot be greater than 60000

stopPrice.name: stopPrice
stopPrice.description: Used with STOP_LOSS, STOP_LOSS_LIMIT, TAKE_PROFIT, and TAKE_PROFIT_LIMIT orders.

isIsolatedMargin.name: isIsolated
isIsolatedMargin.description:
* `TRUE` - For isolated margin
* `FALSE` - Default, not for isolated margin

symbols.name: symbols
symbols.description: Max 5 symbols can be sent; separated by ','

tickerType.name: type
tickerType.description:
Supported values: FULL or MINI.
If none provided, the default is FULL

icebergQty.name: icebergQty
icebergQty.description: Used with LIMIT, STOP_LOSS_LIMIT, and TAKE_PROFIT_LIMIT to create an iceberg order.

lendingType.name: lendingType
lendingType.description:
* `DAILY` - for flexible
* `ACTIVITY` - for activity
* `CUSTOMIZED_FIXED` for fixed

pageIndex.name: pageIndex
pageIndex.description: Page number, default is first page, start form 1

sort.name: sort
sort.description: sort sequence(default=0)0 positive sequence, 1 negative sequence

sortColumn.name: sortColumn
sortColumn.description: Sort by( default 1): 1: miner name, 2: real-time computing power, 3: daily average computing power, 4: real-time rejection rate, 5: last submission time

workerStatus.name: workerStatus
workerStatus.description: miners status(default=0)0 all, 1 valid, 2 invalid, 3 failure

startDate.name: startDate
startDate.description: Search date, millisecond timestamp, while empty query all

endDate.name: endDate
endDate.description: Search date, millisecond timestamp, while empty query all

hashRate.name: hashRate
hashRate.description: Resale hashrate h/s must be transferred (BTC is greater than 500000000000 ETH is greater than 500000)

fromSymbol.name: fromSymbol
fromSymbol.description: Must be sent when type are ISOLATEDMARGIN_MARGIN and ISOLATEDMARGIN_ISOLATEDMARGIN

toSymbol.name: toSymbol
toSymbol.description: Must be sent when type are MARGIN_ISOLATEDMARGIN and ISOLATEDMARGIN_ISOLATEDMARGIN

archived.name: archived
archived.description: Default: false. Set to true for archived data from 6 months ago

crossMarginAccountTransferType.name: type
crossMarginAccountTransferType.description:
* `1` - transfer from main account to margin account
* `2` - transfer from margin account to main account

limitClientOrderId.name: limitClientOrderId
limitClientOrderId.description: A unique Id for the limit order

limitStrategyType.name: limitStrategyType
limitStrategyType.description: The value cannot be less than 1000000.

stopClientOrderId.name: stopClientOrderId
stopClientOrderId.description: A unique Id for the stop loss/stop loss limit leg

ipAddress.name: ipAddress
ipAddress.description: Can be added in batches, separated by commas

optionalIpAddress.name: ipAddress
optionalIpAddress.description: Can be added in batches, separated by commas

optionalTrailingDelta.name: trailingDelta
optionalTrailingDelta.description: Used with STOP_LOSS, STOP_LOSS_LIMIT, TAKE_PROFIT, and TAKE_PROFIT_LIMIT orders.

optionalIsIsolated.name: isIsolated
optionalIsIsolated.description:
* `TRUE` - For isolated margin
* `FALSE` - Default, not for isolated margin

autoCompoundPlan.name: autoCompoundPlan

workingClientOrderId.name: workingClientOrderId
workingClientOrderId.description: Arbitrary unique ID among open orders for the working order. Automatically generated if not sent.

workingQuantity.name: workingQuantity
workingQuantity.description: Sets the quantity for the working order.

workingIcebergQty.name: workingIcebergQty
workingIcebergQty.description: This can only be used if workingTimeInForce is GTC.

pendingType.name: pendingType
pendingType.description: Supported values: Order Types Note that MARKET orders using quoteOrderQty are not supported.

pendingClientOrderId.name: pendingClientOrderId
pendingClientOrderId.description: Arbitrary unique ID among open orders for the pending order. Automatically generated if not sent.

pendingQuantity.name: pendingQuantity
pendingQuantity.description: Sets the quantity for the pending order.

pendingIcebergQty.name: pendingIcebergQty
pendingIcebergQty.description: This can only be used if pendingTimeInForce is GTC.

pendingAboveType.name: pendingAboveType
pendingAboveType.description: Supported values: LIMIT_MAKER, STOP_LOSS, and STOP_LOSS_LIMIT

pendingAboveClientOrderId.name: pendingAboveClientOrderId
pendingAboveClientOrderId.description: Arbitrary unique ID among open orders for the pending above order. Automatically generated if not sent.

pendingAboveIcebergQty.name: pendingAboveIcebergQty
pendingAboveIcebergQty.description: This can only be used if pendingAboveTimeInForce is GTC.

pendingBelowType.name: pendingBelowType
pendingBelowType.description: Supported values: LIMIT_MAKER, STOP_LOSS, and STOP_LOSS_LIMIT

pendingBelowClientOrderId.name: pendingBelowClientOrderId
pendingBelowClientOrderId.description: Arbitrary unique ID among open orders for the pending below order. Automatically generated if not sent.

pendingBelowIcebergQty.name: pendingBelowIcebergQty
pendingBelowIcebergQty.description: This can only be used if pendingBelowTimeInForce is GTC.

marginBuyBorrowAmount.description: will not return if no margin trade happens

marginBuyBorrowAsset.description: will not return if no margin trade happens

firstId.description: Trade ID of the first trade in the interval

lastId.description: Trade ID of the last trade in the interval

count.description: Number of trades in the interval

time.description: Trade executed timestamp, as same as `T` in the stream

M.description: Was the trade the best price match?

asset.description: The sum of BUSD and USDT
The sum of BUSD and USDT

maxNotional.description: notional value limit of current initial leverage
